abstract: More about Occupy Wall Street, the ongoing movement in the financial district.
snippet: More about Occupy Wall Street, the ongoing movement in the financial district.
lead_paragraph: Occupy Wall Street has attracted some famous faces: Slavoj Zizek dropped by over the weekend, and Mark Ruffalo wrote about his time there for The Guardian. Also spotted there: Russell Simmons and Kanye West; Michael Moore, Susan Sarandon, Tim Robbins, even one of the stars of "Gossip Girl," whatever that is. Danny Glover visited the L.A. branch of the movement. Food businesses like Ben and Jerry's, Liberatos Pizza and Sixpoint Craft Ales have donated food to the protesters. More should get on board.
